description: Number of nonzero n X n binary arrays with all 1's connected.
comments: Old name was: "Number of n X n checkerboards in which the set of red squares is edge connected".
author: _David Radcliffe_, Jan 21 2001
extensions: One more term from _John W. Layman_, Jan 25 2001
More terms from _R. H. Hardin_, Feb 28 2002
Clearer name from _R. H. Hardin_, Jul 06 2009
